name: Beanie journey
description: Immerse yourself in the wonderful world of the Beanie Journey game!Get ready to face mutated grapefruits, sand monsters, ancient forest druids, and spirits of the elements in a post-apocalyptic world. But that's not all! Meet Leona, the descendant of a lost civilization who uses his magical powers to enslave mutant creatures and terrorize surviving settlements. As the hero of this story, it's up to you to take down Leona and his army of disposable clones to restore peace and freedom to this world. Are you ready to embark on this epic adventure and save Latcuns from extinction? Play now and find out!
